root.name: City Bus Simulator 2010
root.description: City Bus Simulator is an accurate recreation of a Bus driver's career, featuring: Support for disabled and handicap passengers with "Kneeling" and Wheel chair access.Fully animated paying passengers with voiced dialog.Seamless open 3D world which can be viewed from 3rd person or "Ego" mode, Including interiors.Physics handled By Newton engine.The Ability to Expand your fleet including Tow Trucks, And the power to create your own routes with the inbuilt route editor.Animated wipers.Having to put up with belligerent youths.Sorting out old peoples' change because their vision is failing them.
